com.lavanya.web.controller

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lavanya.web.controller.UserController

  • @Controller
public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller used in MVC architecture to control all the requests related to User object.

    • Method Detail

      • showLoginAndHomePage

        @GetMapping(value="/homePage")
public java.lang.String showLoginAndHomePage(@RequestParam(value="error",required=false)
                                                                             java.lang.String error,
                                                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                             org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /homePage endpoint. This controller-method show the homePage of the site and the login form for the user to be connected
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        error - only when an error exist while login in.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        index.html

      • sendAuthBodyForAuthentication

        @PostMapping(value="/login")
public java.lang.String sendAuthBodyForAuthentication(AuthBodyDto data,
                                                                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /login endpoint. This controller-method send data required for user authentication to the api module.
        Parameters:
        data - is the bean where the password and username of the user are stored to authenticate the user.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated while login in.
        Returns:
        redirect to userDashboard.html

      • logout

        @GetMapping(value="/logout")
public java.lang.String logout(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        GET requests for /logout endpoint. This controller-method is used to logout a user.
        Parameters:
        session - HttpSession that needs to be invalidated to log out the user of interest.
        Returns:
        homePage.html.

      • showUsersListByPage

        @GetMapping(value="/users/{pageNumber}")
public java.lang.String showUsersListByPage(@PathVariable(value="pageNumber")
                                                                                      int pageNumber,
                                                                                      org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        GET requests for /users/{pageNumber} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves from database all users registered with admin or user role and pass that list to the view "usersList.html"
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        pageNumber - an int to specify which page of Users to be displayed.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        usersList.html

      • showSignUpForm

        @GetMapping(value="/signup")
public java.lang.String showSignUpForm(@RequestParam(value="error",required=false)
                                                                     java.lang.String error,
                                                                     org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /signup endpoint. This controller-method creates a new object User and pass it to the form for the User to be created with all its attributes.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        error - only when an error exists while signing up.
        Returns:
        addUser.html

      • saveUser

        @PostMapping(value="/saveUser")
public java.lang.String saveUser(@ModelAttribute(value="user")
                                                                  UserToRegister user,
                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /saveUser endpoint. This controller-method is part of CRUD and is used to save in database User object.
        Parameters:
        user - which is is the user to register.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        model - to pass data to the view.
        Returns:
        addChildren.html.

      • showUserProfileToVisit

        @GetMapping(value="/profile/user/{uuid}")
public java.lang.String showUserProfileToVisit(@PathVariable(value="uuid")
                                                                                          java.util.UUID id,
                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /profile/user/{uuid} endpoint. This controller-method displays to the user connected the profile of another user with basic information.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        id - uuid of the user profile visited by user connected
        Returns:
        userProfileToVisit.html

      • validateProfile

        @PostMapping(value="/validateProfile/{pageNumber}")
public java.lang.String validateProfile(Validate validate,
                                                                                             @PathVariable(value="pageNumber")
                                                                                             int currentPage,
                                                                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
        POST requests for /validateProfile/{pageNumber} endpoint. This controller-method is used to update isValidated attribute of user object.
        Parameters:
        validate - object that passes information to validate or not a user.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        currentPage - an int to specify which page of Users to be displayed when redirecting to usersList.html.
        Returns:
        usersList.html

      • showUsersFiltered

        @GetMapping(value="/showUsers/{pageNumber}")
public java.lang.String showUsersFiltered(@PathVariable(value="pageNumber")
                                                                                        int currentPage,
                                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                        @RequestParam(name="keyword",required=false)
                                                                                        java.lang.String keyword,
                                                                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        GET requests for /showUsers/{pageNumber} endpoint. This controller-method retrieves all users searched by keyword, display them as Page to the view "searchUser". It offers the possibility to search a user with filters.
        Parameters:
        model - to pass data to the view.
        currentPage - an int to specify which page of Users to be displayed.
        keyword - a String attribute from Search object used to filter a search users by keyword.
        session - a HttpSession where attributes of interest are stored, here it concerns the token generated following user connection.
        Returns:
        "searchUser.html".
